text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump this was the most DISGUSTING CAMPAIGN SPEECH during what was supposed to be a CoronaVirus press conference I have ever seen. You are more concerned w your image than the thousands of Americans dying everyday. WHAT A PIG!!!! The most embarrassing & incompetent 'POTUS' ever. YUCK!
